variable.name: Certification_CHVRS_Description_Label
variable.value: suitable for people 18 years of age or older
suitable for people 14 years of age or older
suitable for viewing by all ages

variable.name: Certification_EIRIN_Description_Label
variable.value: for persons aged 18 and above only
for persons aged 15 and above only
parental guidance requested for young people under 12 years

variable.name: Certification_KIJKWIJZER_Description_Label
variable.value: not allowed for children younger than 18 years
not allowed for children younger than 16 years
not recommended for children younger than 14 years
not recommended for children younger than 12 years
not recommended for children younger than 9 years
not recommended for children younger than 6 years

variable.name: Certification_MPAA_Description_Label
variable.value: adults only, no one 17 and under admitted
